name: Actors That Are Related Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 5 Questions

questions.text: My husband and I played the parents of a little girl named 'Matilda'. He was on 'Taxi', and I was on 'Cheers': we are  _______ and ______ ?
questions.correct: Danny Rhea & Rhea Danny & Danny Devito Rhea Perlman & Rhea Perlman Danny Devito & Devito Perlman & Perlman Devito & Danny and Rhea & Rhea and Danny
questions.explanation:
Danny Rhea & Rhea Danny & Danny Devito Rhea Perlman & Rhea Perlman Danny Devito & Devito Perlman & Perlman Devito & Danny and Rhea & Rhea and Danny.

	They were married on January 28, 1982 and have 3 children.

questions.text: In 1999, my brother and I appeared in '200 Cigarettes'. He was a bartender and I was a character named Tom. Who are we: _______ and ____ ?
questions.correct: Casey Ben & Ben Casey & Casey and Ben & Ben and Casey
questions.explanation:
Casey Ben & Ben Casey & Casey and Ben & Ben and Casey.

	Casey and Ben Affleck.

questions.text: I was also in '200 Cigarettes'. I was Cindy. I have a gorgeous mom who is also an actress. I, also, married Chris Robinson from the Black Crowes New Year's Eve. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Kate Hudson & Hudson.

	My mom is Goldie Hawn. My biological father is Bill Hudson, however, I consider Kurt Russell my 'Pa'.

questions.text: Hi, I am Julia Roberts. Remember me from 'Pretty Woman'. Did you know that I have an older sister that appeared in 'Runaway Bride' with me? She was Elaine from New York.
questions.correct: Lisa Roberts Gillian & Lisa R. Gillian & Lisa Roberts & Lisa & Lisa R Gillian
questions.explanation:
Lisa Roberts Gillian & Lisa R. Gillian & Lisa Roberts & Lisa & Lisa R Gillian

	I never realized that the Roberts family had another talented family member.

questions.text: In 1998, I was that greasy Pat Healy in 'There's Something About Mary.' In 1986, my younger brother was in 'Platoon' as Bunny. Who are we: _____ and _____ ?
questions.correct: Matt Kevin & Kevin Matt & Kevin and Matt & Matt and Kevin
questions.explanation:
Matt Kevin & Kevin Matt & Kevin and Matt & Matt and Kevin.

	Kevin and Matt Dillon.
